import {useState} from 'react' import './index.css' const UploadData = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [media, setMedia] = useState(null) const submitHandler = evennt => { console.log(title) console.log(media) } const mediaHandler = event => { let mediaDetails = event.target.files[0] setMedia(mediaDetails) } return (

Upload Media

Title Of Event setTitle(event.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Title of Media..." className="input title" id="title" type="text" />
) } export default UploadData
